about_the_game:
Brew, Spill, Repeat! Get a hands-on taste of Clumsy Coffee Simulator with this demo version. In this demo, you step into the life of clumsy barista in a compact café setting that shows off our core mechanics.

Try out café customization firsthand. Tweak your space with simple changes that make the place uniquely yours.

Keep your café running by managing your stock and organizing your supplies. It’s all about mastering the basics in a fun, controlled environment.

Experience the challenge of taking orders under pressure. The demo tests your ability to handle chaos and rewards precision with a glimpse into our tip system.

Get a sneak peek at our recipe creation menu. And when you’re ready, see how you can expand your café to serve more customers.

This demo is a compact, standalone experience showcasing the unique, physics-driven gameplay of Clumsy Coffee Simulator without diving into the full game’s content. Enjoy the chaos!
detailed_description:
Brew, Spill, Repeat! Get a hands-on taste of Clumsy Coffee Simulator with this demo version. In this demo, you step into the life of clumsy barista in a compact café setting that shows off our core mechanics.

Try out café customization firsthand. Tweak your space with simple changes that make the place uniquely yours.

Keep your café running by managing your stock and organizing your supplies. It’s all about mastering the basics in a fun, controlled environment.

Experience the challenge of taking orders under pressure. The demo tests your ability to handle chaos and rewards precision with a glimpse into our tip system.

Get a sneak peek at our recipe creation menu. And when you’re ready, see how you can expand your café to serve more customers.

This demo is a compact, standalone experience showcasing the unique, physics-driven gameplay of Clumsy Coffee Simulator without diving into the full game’s content. Enjoy the chaos!
name: Clumsy Coffee Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Brew, Spill, Repeat!Step into the chaos as a clumsy barista, crafting drinks and building your dream café. Customize your space, manage orders, and embrace the spills and fun in this engaging simulator."
